channel.title: Sonic Lobster (\/) Portland, Maine Cover Band
channel.description: Recent content on Sonic Lobster (\/) Portland, Maine Cover Band

item.title: Nerd Stuff
item.description: NERD ALERT => website created by tom => built using hugo ssg => aesthetic’d using cyberscape theme => hosted on github pages => deployed with github actions => source code

item.title: Lineup
item.description: LINEUP Lead Vocals/Guitar/Synths: Nate A man of many talents, Nate brings energy and versatility to the band. You’ll never see him standing still during a show (or in general). Nate has played an eclectic range of music in his history, including being part of a Taylor Swift cover duo in high school. Synth Specialist: Carl Carl adds many sounds to the band. Some of those sounds include “deep techno riffs”, “honky tonk piano”, and “electric organ”.

item.title: Contact
item.description: CONTACT AND BOOKING We’re actively booking shows! If you’d like us to play for your brewery, or your farmer’s market, or your dog’s birthday party, or whatever else, or if you’d like to send us requests and/or criticisms, you can reach out: Email: soniclobstermaine [at] gmail [dot] com Our DMs are open!

item.title: Upcoming Shows
item.description: SEE US LIVE Saturday September 21 @ Spring Point Tavern With Nuclear Bootz Benjamin W Pickett St, South Portland, 8:30PM - 12AM, $5 Cover We are always booking for more shows! Check back here for updates, or follow our Instagram for more.
